title: Game Crash
body:
Its already 4.th year that i am playing this game. Today i wanted to play 1 game after a month.
After champion select, inspect of normal loading it shut down back into the lobby and wrote: Game crash 
If i press reconnect it will just jump back into the lobby again and again and again....
Can someone help?    (i tried repair)

replies.body: It sounds like you experienced a bugsplat, which happens when something like bad files or drivers fail to load the game.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get that fixed up.  Make sure to test it in a custom game to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
